detail_desc: Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Lightweight jacket in mesh with dangling sequins. No fasteners. Jersey lining.

Soft, padded nursing bras in jersey made from an organic cotton blend with opening, jersey-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Decorative lace trims, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Necklace in thin metal snake chain with a large disc pendant. Adjustable length 75-83 cm.
Top in an extra-soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck and long sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Calf-length dress in a double-layered cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.
Shorts in soft, airy cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Boxy hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Metal chain necklace with four metal pendants in different designs. Length 60 cm.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a zip-through hoodie and pair of trousers in soft fleece made from recycled polyester. Jacket with a lined hood with ears on the top and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with a wide, foldover waist panel made from organic cotton jersey and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Block-heeled sandals in grained imitation leather with blunt open toes and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.
Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long, cuffed sleeves. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist with wide elastication and a high cut at the back.
Off-the-shoulder shirt in a patterned cotton weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an extended, dropped collar. Buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Long metal earrings with faceted plastic stones. Length 7.5 cm.
Jersey trousers in a sturdy cotton blend with an elasticated waist and legs with sewn-in creases.

Lightweight nylon bomber jacket with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket, an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine knit with an appliqué at the top, detachable tie belt at the waist and gathered side seams for best fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Padded slippers in a soft knit with an ankle-high shaft with a faux fur trim and decorative bow with faux fur pompoms. Pile linings and insoles and soft with anti-slip protectors.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Slightly boxy jumper in a soft, chunky knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Top in soft organic cotton jersey with lace. Triangular cups with removable inserts and a functional fastening for easier nursing access. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication below the bust and gathers in the sides for best fit. The lining of the cups is made of recycled polyester.
Short, straight dress in jersey with long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and an open back pocket.
Striped short-sleeved top in slub jersey made from organic cotton with a round neck and rounded hem.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Triangle bikini top with decorative straps at the hem, lined cups, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a plastic fastening at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Crescent shaped earrings in metal with long fringes decorated with glass rhinestones, bar-shaped plastic beads and pearly plastic beads. Length 9.5 cm.

Calf-length dress woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with a soft shimmer. Small stand-up collar, a V-neck with ties at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined.
Fitted off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen, wide neckline and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Lace balconette bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in several different ways and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Beret in fine-knit wool containing some nylon.
Jeggings in a washed, stretch cotton blend with concealed adjustable elastication at the waist, a fake fly, belt loops and fake front pockets.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Longer top in soft, patterned fleece with long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Drawstring hood with wide, shiny ribbons, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs. Unlined.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top. Long sleeves with smocking and a narrow frill at the cuffs, a seam with a drawstring at the waist, inset ladder stitching and a scalloped lace trim at the hem.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a lace detail at the top, low waist, ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.
Transparent plastic make-up bag with a metallic finish and zip at the top that continues half-way down each end. Unlined. Size approx. 8.5x10x18 cm.
Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist, chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a zip in one side.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Trainers in chunky canvas with a lightly padded tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with a rounded collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Dungaree shorts in an airy organic cotton weave with buttons at the top and frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back. Elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a lined lower section. Narrow elastication and a frill trim around the hems, and press-studs at the crotch.

Parka in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, two flap patch pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Jersey lining.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Polo-neck jumper in a cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in washed twill with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and tapered legs.
Calf-length skirt in softly draping satin with gathered elastication at the waist and concealed pockets in the side seams.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and half-length sleeves with slits and ties. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, fine-knit cotton with a button placket, open chest pocket, contrasting colour elbow patches, roll-edge neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing some wool with a stand-up collar, decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lightly padded cups with removable inserts and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in imitation suede and canvas with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Jersey linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved jumpsuit in velour with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front and front pockets. Wide, elasticated seam at the waist and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication and a flounce at the top with a small opening and ties. Short, elasticated sleeves with a frill trim, and elastication and a flounce at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, funnel collar and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.
